title: Executive Order 5890-Partial Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands, California
content: It is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 4652, dated May 18, 1927, withdrawing certain lands in California and Nevada for use by the Department of Commerce as air-mail beacon sites and landing fields, is hereby revoked in so far as it affects the NW. ¼ sec. 20, T. 9 N., R. 2 W., San Bernardino meridian, California.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5890-Partial Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361475
